Key Match Events: The Charlotte Hornets won the game 115-114 against the Milwaukee Bucks.
Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball was fined $100,000 by the NBA for a homophobic comment during a postgame interview.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Giannis Antetokounmpo was defended by the Hornets in the final possession.
Others: LaMelo Ball is averaging 29.6 points, 6.3 assists and 5.3 rebounds per game this season.
